definition[0]: the bottom part of a hat that sticks out to protect you from sun and rain
example[0]: an old straw hat with a broad brim
definition[1]: the top edge of a container
example[1]: She filled each glass to the brim.
example[2]: The cup was filled to the brim with coffee.
definition[2]: if your eyes brim with tears, or if tears brim from your eyes, you start to cry
example[3]: Her tears brimmed over again as she started to speak.
